objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel with a smooth, neutral-colored matte surface. It is a broad, low-profile rectangular slab forming the base of the booth, designed for durability and a clean exhibition look.
A tall vertical rectangular wall panel with a smooth, neutral finish. It forms the back enclosure of the booth with clean edges and a slim profile, suitable for mounting graphics or décor.
A vertical rectangular side wall panel with a neutral tone and minimalistic design. It provides structural framing for the booth and a clean backdrop for displays.
A vertical rectangular side wall panel with a neutral tone and minimalistic design. It provides structural framing for the booth and a clean backdrop for displays.
A sleek registration desk formed by a rectangular prism with sharp edges and a bold, bright-colored finish. The surfaces are smooth and the design is modern, optimized for visitor interaction.
A simple cylindrical column with uniform circular cross-section and smooth surface. It serves as the central support for a round tabletop in a minimalistic style.
A circular tabletop formed by a thin flat disc with gently rounded edges and a smooth surface, designed for casual visitor seating.

A modern exhibition chair featuring a gently curved backrest and seat, supported by four slender legs. The design is minimalistic with smooth surfaces and a neutral finish.
